title: 谭书记终于无耻地把指控上升到种族歧视的高度
contents:
WHO DG @DrTedros reveals he’s received death threats & racial abuse. Says he is proud to be Black & doesn’t give a damn - ‘But when the whole Black community is insulted, when Africa is insulted, then I don’t tolerate’.  On Trump criticising him: don’t politicise Covid-19

https://twitter.com/samirasawlani/status/1247932911564840962

此时在推特评论里也洋溢着黑人兄弟的民族尊严，希望大家一起去把正确的答案顶上来。
